theme_reveal.headline: DevOps
theme_reveal.body: Practices and tooling that speed up reliable software delivery.

entries.clue: Automated pipeline that builds, tests, and deploys code changes
Infrastructure defined and managed through code and version control
A small, portable unit that packages an app and its dependencies
Tool widely used to build, ship, and run containers
System for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containers
Practice of collecting metrics, logs, and traces to understand system health
